sentences.sContent: He devised a new type of transistor.
sentences.sContent_eng: He devised a new type of transistor.
sentences.sCn: 他发明了一种新的晶体管。

sentences.sContent: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.sCn: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。

sentences.sContent: We are using this transistor to amplify a telephone signal.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are using this transistor to amplify a telephone signal.
sentences.sCn: 我们正在使用这种晶体管来放大电话信号。

phrases.pCn: 面结型晶体管；结式晶体管

words.tran: 晶体管化的；装有晶体管的

trans.tranOther: a small piece of electronic equipment in radios, televisions etc that controls the flow of electricity
